name: 3D Ultra™ Minigolf Adventures
description: Whether you're a seasoned player or just a beginner, get ready to tee off for a quick and fun match with four animated stylish characters. Putt your way through 36 fun-filled holes of minigolf on 3D designed courses with elevated greens, bunkers, bridges and water hazards, among other crazy obstacles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista Processor: Pentium 700 MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM  Graphics: Direct 3D 32MB DirectX 9.0c DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c Hard Drive: 50 MB free hard disk space Sound: DirectX-compliant Sound Card

reviews.review_text: This is a fun game to play with friends, seeing as how I also own it on Xbox 360, I've played many fun rounds. Its still too bad the second one no longer exists.
This game is the ♥♥♥♥.  Someone bought this for $0.01 AUS (about half a penny) then gifted it to me, and I still feel ripped off.
There's no online multiplayer, only local.
I don't need to tell you much except that you should avoid this game at all costs. I got this game free, and it basiccally lost all value within 10 minutes.  Verdict: GET THE HELL AWAY. GO. RUN!
